metadata.title: CVE-2019-20392 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory access flaw is present in libyang before v1.0-r1 in thefunction resolve_feature_value() when an if-feature statement is usedinside a list key node, and the feature used is not defined. Applicationsthat use libyang to parse untrusted input yang files may crash.

criterions.comment: libyang package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
